pullRequest.body:
... and with kernels. For good definitional properties, the equality `ker f = eqLocus f 0` is not used.

---

ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.

```suggestion
  toFun m :=
  { toFun := fun a â†¦ âŸ¨m âŠ—â‚œ a, by simp [show f a = g a from a.property]âŸ©
    map_add' := fun x y â†¦ by simp [tmul_add]
    map_smul' := fun r x â†¦ by simp }
```
I think this is still the preferred format?
Oh I didn't know there was a rule on this. Good to know!

```suggestion
  toFun m :=
  { toFun := fun a â†¦ âŸ¨m âŠ—â‚œ a, by simpâŸ©
    map_add' := fun x y â†¦ by simp [tmul_add]
    map_smul' := fun r x â†¦ by simp }
```
it might be easier to bundle it into `(N â†’â‚—[R] Q) â†’â‚—[R] M âŠ—[R] N â†’â‚—[A] M âŠ—[R] Q` straightaway so that you won't need to provide those add and sub lemmas.

pullRequest.title: feat(RingTheory/Flat): flat base change commutes with equalizers
